detectors.description:

detectors.description:

	External calls:
	- IERC20GatewayMintable(contractAddress).mintTo(address(this),amount - bal) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20Gateway.sol#904)

	- TokenWithdrawn(msg.sender,TokenKind.ERC20,contractAddress,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20Gateway.sol#908)
